description: Describes the ClassicLink DNS support status of one or more VPCs. If enabled, the DNS hostname of a linked EC2-Classic instance resolves to its private IP address when addressed from an instance in the VPC to which it's linked. Similarly, the DNS hostname of an instance in a VPC resolves to its private IP address when addressed from a linked EC2-Classic instance.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to include in another request to get the next page of items. This value is null when there are no more items to return.

nested_items.name: Vpcs
nested_items.description: Information about the ClassicLink DNS support status of the VPCs.

nested_items.name: ClassicLinkDnsSupported
nested_items.description: Indicates whether ClassicLink DNS support is enabled for the VPC.
